content.description: TABLE 1. OZONE DAMAGE IN SIX PLANT SPECIES
content.question: Species Number of Plants Observed Number of Damaged Plants Percent of Plants with Damage Ash <math alttext="544" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>544</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="41" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>41</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="7.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>7.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Cherry <math alttext="30" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>30</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="6.7" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6.7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Dogwood <math alttext="41" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>41</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="4.9" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.9</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Sassafras <math alttext="132" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>132</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="2.3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2.3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Sweet gum <math alttext="170" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>170</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="1.2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1.2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> Wild grape <math alttext="124" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>124</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="20" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>20</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> <math alttext="16.1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>16.1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> To investigate the effects of ground-level ozone pollution on different species of plants, researchers recorded the number of plants in a certain area that had ozone-induced leaf damage. Based on the results of the survey shown in Table 1, which of the following plant species was most affected by ozone pollution?

skill.text: 4.B: Describe data from a table or graph, including: i. identifying specific data points ii. describing trends and patterns in the data iii. describing relationships between variables
